page.title: 07HOUSE PRICES IN THE RHU AREA
page.content:
LOCATION HOUSE TYPE PRICE
Shandon_4bed.flat conv.mansion Â£39,000 Shandon_3bed.modernised cottageÂ£58,000 Rhu_modern 2bed.flat Â£28,250 Rhu_modern 2bed.terraced house Â£31,500 Rhu_3bed.lower villa conversionÂ£36,000 Rhu_3bed.flat converted mansionÂ£46,500 Rhu_modern 4bed.detached villa Â£75,000 Rhu_detached executive home Â£120,000 Clynder_3bed.upper villa conv. Â£27,000 Clynder_mod.3bed.det.bungalow Â£34,000 Clynder_5bed.detached villa Â£69,75
This is a selection of the properties for sale in our area in June 1985.It is normal for the final selling price of a house to exceed the asking price. Although houses in all three districts are of similar standards,those in Clynder tend to be lower priced due to being further away from main centres.
